content.text: One-time use items unless stated otherwise. Most cost 1 AP to use. Items marked Quick can be used as a free action on your turn.
Healing, condition removal, and combat enhancers. The stim crash is real — plan accordingly.

rows: Heal 1d6 HP. Quick. Limit 1 per encounter.
Heal 2d6 HP. Can be used on adjacent allies.
Heal 3d6 HP. Clear one condition (Bleed, Poison, or Hex). Costs 2 AP.
+2 accuracy for 2 rounds. Crash: -1 to all checks for 1 round.
+1 Armor for 3 rounds. Crash: -1 Armor for 1 round.
Stabilize a downed ally at 1 HP. Does not prevent the Scar.
Suppress one Scar debuff for 24 hours. Does not remove the Scar.

content.text: Grenades, charges, and area denial. Thrown at Close range, targeting an Adjacent cluster unless noted. See Advanced Rules: Throwables & Area Effects for dodge rolls, cluster rules, and knockback.

rows: 3d6 damage to Adjacent cluster. Dodge: Reflex DC 9 for half.
2d6 damage to Adjacent cluster. Burn 2 for 2 rounds. Dodge: Reflex DC 9 for half + no Burn.
Adjacent cluster: Grit DC 7 or Dazed 1 round (-2 acc, -2 Evasion).
Creates Obscured zone for 3 rounds. Blocks line of sight. No save.
2d8 damage to single target. Knockback 1 range band. Dodge: Reflex DC 9 for half + no Knockback.
2d8 magic damage to Adjacent cluster. +1 Toxicity to user. Dodge: Reflex DC 9 for half.
Adjacent cluster: +2 Toxicity. Grit DC 7 or Poison 1. Zone persists 2 rounds.
Disables all Tech-tagged gear in Adjacent cluster for 2 rounds. No save.
Place during prep or as 1 AP. First creature entering takes 4d6 damage. Dodge: Reflex DC 9 for half.
Single target: Immobilized. Chrome DC 6 to break free (costs 1 AP).
Cover Adjacent area. Entering costs +1 AP. Lasts until cleared. No save.

content.text: Field equipment for exploration, communication, and survival. Most are reusable unless noted as consumed on use.

rows: Illuminates Adjacent area. Lasts 8 hours. Reusable.
Visible for miles. Calls attention — for better or worse.
+2 Athletics for climbing. Required for vertical surfaces DC 8+. Reusable.
Required for Subterfuge: Pick Locks. +1 to the check. Reusable.
Team comms within 1 mile. Basic encryption. Reusable.
Team comms within 5 miles. Military encryption. Works across rift boundaries. Reusable.
Fires grapple line up to Close range. Reusable.
Read Toxicity level of yourself or another. Normally corp-restricted. Reusable.
+1 Navigation in rifts. Detects rift boundaries within Close range. Reusable.
Reduces ambient Toxicity gain by 1 per encounter (min 0). Does not block channeled magic. Reusable.
Safely contains one small rift creature or biological sample. Required for capture contracts.
Stabilizes a wild rift entrance for 1 hour. Prevents collapse during extraction. Consumed on use.
Basic crafting and repairs in the field. -1 to checks vs proper workshop. Reusable.

content.text: Pre-packaged loadouts for specific mission types. Buying the kit is cheaper than sourcing the parts individually.

rows: 2× Specimen Container, Climbing Kit, Portable Light, 50m rope
3× Med Patch, 2× Trauma Kit, Adrenaline Shot, Anti-Venom
Lockpick Set, 2× Smoke Grenade, Comm Unit, Grapple Launcher
3× Frag Grenade, 2× Trap Mine, EMP Charge
Rift Compass, Rift Anchor, Breather Mask, 2× Detox Hypo, 2× Portable Light
2× Frag Grenade, 2× Combat Stim, Trauma Kit, Smoke Grenade
